Technical Capabilities

Full-stack RF product development under one roof.

RF Engineering

  • 315/433/868/915MHz frequency design
  • HCS200/HCS300/HCS301 rolling-code compatible programming
  • EV1527/KeeLoq/Auto-scan protocols
  • Range optimization and antenna design

Manufacturing

  • Injection molding (PP/PC/ABS/Metal)
  • Silicone keypad production
  • SMT assembly and wave soldering
  • 100% aging test and QC

Certification

  • FCC Part 15 compliance testing
  • CE RED certification support
  • RoHS and REACH compliance
  • ISO9001 quality management

Firmware Development

  • Custom encryption algorithms
  • Multi-channel and multi-device support
  • OTA update capabilities
  • iOS/Android app integration
